definition: reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
light/ray/CL:道[dao4]/bright/only/merely/to use up
beginnings/clues/mental state/thread
Guangxu Emperor

sentences.english: But the ideals were stifled by Cixi and Guangxu was jailed in his own palace.
sentences.chinese: 但是，理想扼殺慈溪和光緒被關押在自己的宮殿。

sentences.english: Cixi is Emperor Guangxu's mother. She holds the real power of the country.
sentences.chinese: 慈禧是光緒皇帝的母后，掌握着國家實權。

sentences.english: We were told later that this was the Young Empress, wife of the Emperor Kwang Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 後來我們才知道她是光緒皇帝的妃子，很年輕的皇后。

sentences.english: Your Qing dynasty methods are way out of date.
sentences.chinese: 你那套光緒年的辦法太守舊了。

sentences.english: Along with the Guangxu Emperor, she fled to Xi'an.
sentences.chinese: 隨着光緒帝，她逃到了西安。

sentences.english: Founded in Guangxu years Feng burst stomach has been 130 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 創建於光緒年間的爆肚馮至今已有130多年曆史。

sentences.english: In 1904, Huixing has funded three hundred silver dollar.
sentences.chinese: 光緒三十年，惠興募集得到了三百多銀元。

sentences.english: IT was also where Emperor Guangxu of the late Qing dynasty was kept under house arrest.
sentences.chinese: 這是光緒皇帝也在晚清一直被軟禁。

reign name of Ming emperor (1573-1619)
county head magistrate (old)
Yuanbao district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
a silver or gold ingot/mock ingot (burnt as offering in worship)/a name for ancient currency/a rare genius
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)
Ministry of Revenue in imperial China
Chongzhen, reign name of last Ming emperor (1628-1644)
in the years of/during those years/period (of dynasty or decade)
Yongle Emperor, reign name of third Ming emperor Zhu Di 朱棣[Zhu1 Di4] (1360-1424), reigned 1403-1424, Temple name 明成祖[Ming2 Cheng2 zu3]
successful candidate in the highest imperial civil service examination/palace graduate
Yuan Shikai (1859-1916), senior general of late Qing, subsequently warlord and self-proclaimed emperor of China
mint/CL:座[zuo4]

Republic of China
